original_solution_mapping.L1: Each dog eats 6*2=<<6*2=12>>12 cups of food a day
original_solution_mapping.L2: His two dogs eat 12*2=<<12*2=24>>24 cups a day
original_solution_mapping.L3: Thus they eat 24/4=<<24/4=6>>6 pounds a day
original_solution_mapping.L4: So they eat 6*30=<<6*30=180>>180 pounds a month
original_solution_mapping.L5: So he needs to buy 180/20=<<180/20=9>>9 bags of food

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5975.
    Returns: the number of 20-pound dog food bags Mike needs to buy a month.
    """
    # L1
    cups_per_feeding = 6 # 6 cups of dog food
    feedings_per_day = 2 # twice a day
    cups_per_dog_per_day = cups_per_feeding * feedings_per_day

    # L2
    number_of_dogs = 2 # 2 dogs
    total_cups_per_day = cups_per_dog_per_day * number_of_dogs

    # L3
    pounds_per_cup_denominator = 4 # 1/4 of a pound
    total_pounds_per_day = total_cups_per_day / pounds_per_cup_denominator

    # L4
    days_per_month = 30 # WK
    total_pounds_per_month = total_pounds_per_day * days_per_month

    # L5
    pounds_per_bag = 20 # 20 pound bags
    num_bags_needed = total_pounds_per_month / pounds_per_bag

    # FA
    answer = num_bags_needed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Each dog eats {cups_per_feeding}*{feedings_per_day}=<<{cups_per_feeding}*{feedings_per_day}={cups_per_dog_per_day}>>{cups_per_dog_per_day} cups of food a day
His {number_of_dogs} dogs eat {cups_per_dog_per_day}*{number_of_dogs}=<<{cups_per_dog_per_day}*{number_of_dogs}={total_cups_per_day}>>{total_cups_per_day} cups a day
Thus they eat {total_cups_per_day}/{pounds_per_cup_denominator}=<<{total_cups_per_day}/{pounds_per_cup_denominator}={total_pounds_per_day}>>{total_pounds_per_day} pounds a day
So they eat {total_pounds_per_day}*{days_per_month}=<<{total_pounds_per_day}*{days_per_month}={total_pounds_per_month}>>{total_pounds_per_month} pounds a month
So he needs to buy {total_pounds_per_month}/{pounds_per_bag}=<<{total_pounds_per_month}/{pounds_per_bag}={num_bags_needed}>>{num_bags_needed} bags of food
